Name: Wolf Adventures
About the game: Interactive novel in pixel style about the king Happy Wolf. You're a powerful king Happy Wolf of the kingdom EbenGrad. For a long time, your citizens were happy about everything, but times have changed. Every character has his dialogue options which will determine their attitude towards you. Also, you need to solve EbenGrad's citizens' problems to improve your reputation. It all depends on your choices... Indeed!
